meanings.sent1: The birds sang a canorous tune in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The choir's canorous voices filled the concert hall with beautiful music.
meanings.sent3: The canorous melody of the wind chimes made the garden feel like a magical place.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as canorous as a symphony, bringing joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The canorous notes of the piano resonated through the room, enchanting all who listened.

meanings.definition: Having a pleasant sound or tone.
meanings.sent1: The canorous laughter of children playing echoed through the park.
meanings.sent2: The canorous sound of the waterfall was soothing to the ears.
meanings.sent3: The canorous purring of the cat put everyone in a relaxed mood.
meanings.sent4: The canorous voice of the storyteller captivated the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The canorous bells chiming in the distance signaled the start of the festival.
